statements: SELECT * FROM music_genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_genres FROM music_genres;
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name LIKE '%rock%';
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(genre_id) AS total_genres FROM music_genres;
SELECT * FROM playlist
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM playlist WHERE genre = 'Pop'
SELECT song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE song_id = 5
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC
SELECT playlist_name, count(*) as total_songs FROM playlist GROUP BY playlist_name HAVING count(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM playlist WHERE playlist_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM playlist WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT song_name, artist, release_year FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlist WHERE playlist_name LIKE '%Party%' ORDER BY playlist_id;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM playlist WHERE genre IN ('Pop', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY playlist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_genres;
SELECT playlist_name, genre_name FROM playlists INNER JOIN music_genres ON playlists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, genre_name FROM songs INNER JOIN music_genres ON songs.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT song_name FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_id DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE genre_id = 2 AND playlist_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name AS Genre, COUNT(song_id) AS Total_Songs FROM songs INNER JOIN music_genres ON songs.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT playlist_name, genre_name FROM playlists INNER JOIN music_genres ON playlists.genre_id = music_genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name LIKE '%Rock%';
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran' OR artist_name = 'Adele' ORDER BY song_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM Playlist WHERE playlist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Artist WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT song_name, artist FROM Song WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT album_name, artist_name FROM Album ORDER BY artist_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM Playlist ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist FROM Song WHERE genre='Pop' ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Artist WHERE genre='Rock' LIMIT 5;
SELECT album_name, artist_name FROM Album JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.artist_id WHERE Album.genre='Pop' ORDER BY album_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genre;
SELECT genre_name FROM Genre ORDER BY genre_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artist WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM Album WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT song_title, duration, album_id FROM Song ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM Artist ORDER BY artist_name DESC, nationality ASC;
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM Album WHERE release_date >= '2020-01-01';

SELECT artist_name, genre_name, album_title FROM Artist INNER JOIN Album ON Artist.artist_id = Album.artist_id INNER JOIN Genre ON Album.genre_id = Genre.genre_id ORDER BY artist_name ASC, genre_name DESC, album_title ASC;
SELECT song_title, duration FROM Song WHERE duration > 180 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT playlist_name FROM Playlist;
